attributes.action: Pass a new law to prohibit Slow moving Construction vehicles and agricultural tractors using public roads in the hours of darkness
attributes.additional_details:
The lights  of Earth moving  construction vehicles such as diggers and trench making vehicles  are very often defective or covered by mud,  meaning that the vehicle can nearly be invisible to following traffic on country roads at night.  Equally  Agricultural vehicles towing trailers   travelling at slow speeds at night with  badly maintained lights can be a danger on roads without street lights.

Please pass new legislation that these vehicles MUST  only be transported  on a low loader  at night.
